Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 1
Description.Text: Our Warsaw lodging destination features 523 guest rooms, including 95 spacious suites and three Concierge Level suites.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 2
Description.Text: With an ideal location next to the central train station, our Warsaw downtown hotel provides easy access to most attractions.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 3
Description.Text: Five restaurants and 22 function venues total more than 2,700 square meters of flexible meeting and exhibition space.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 1
Description.Text: Our Warsaw hotel offers more than 2,700 square meters of beautiful wedding venues to fit your needs.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 2
Description.Text: We provide the perfect venue for small or large social events in the heart of downtown Warsaw.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 3
Description.Text: Our event management team can turn any wedding venue in our Warsaw hotel into your dream space.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 4
Description.Text: We offer onsite and offsite catering and custom menus to enhance weddings and social events.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 5
Description.Text: With a certified kosher kitchen, we are able to accommodate all kosher events, including weddings.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 6
Description.Text: Complete your dream wedding in Warsaw by reserving elegant group accommodations at our hotel.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 1
Description.Text: Make yourself at home in one of our 523 immaculately designed guest rooms and suites here in Warsaw.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 2
Description.Text: All of our accommodations feature pillowtop mattresses and Marriott's famous Revive bedding.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 3
Description.Text: Most of our guest room accommodations offer awe-inspiring views of downtown Warsaw.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 4
Description.Text: With our 24-hour room service, you can enjoy a delicious meal in the privacy of your accommodations.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 5
Description.Text: Stay connected here in Warsaw. We offer wired and wireless Internet access in every guest room.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 6
Description.Text: Additional perks, like an in-room safe and LCD TV, add convenience and comfort to your Warsaw visit.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights
Description.ListItem: Make yourself at home in one of our 523 immaculately designed guest rooms and suites here in Warsaw.
All of our accommodations feature pillowtop mattresses and Marriott's famous Revive bedding.
Most of our guest room accommodations offer awe-inspiring views of downtown Warsaw.
With our 24-hour room service, you can enjoy a delicious meal in the privacy of your accommodations.
Stay connected here in Warsaw. We offer wired and wireless Internet access in every guest room.
Additional perks, like an in-room safe and LCD TV, add convenience and comfort to your Warsaw visit.

Description.Name: Description
Description.Text: The Warsaw Marriott Hotel offers luxuriously appointed guest accommodation options with new Marriott bedding. Many dining options, on-site spa, casino & 40th floor Panorama Bar & Lounge with magnificent views. Over 2,600 sq m of meeting & exhibition venue

Description.Name: Property Description Long
Description.Text: Discover a luxury getaway in the heart of Poland's capital. The Warsaw Marriott Hotel proudly offers elegant lodging and an ideal downtown location, near some of the city's most popular attractions. Settle in to one of our 523 impeccably appointed hotel rooms and suites, nearly all of which offer gorgeous views of downtown Warsaw. Additional lodging amenities include ergonomic workspaces and high-speed Internet. Our onsite restaurant, Parmizzano's, serves fine Italian dining and is a favorite with Warsaw locals as well as hotel guests. Stop by Panorama Bar & Lounge afterward for a nightcap, and enjoy stunning downtown vistas. Book a treatment at our full-service hotel spa, or challenge yourself to a workout in the state-of-the-art fitness center and our indoor pool. Plan distinctive events in one of our 21 versatile, refined meeting venues, followed by a post-meeting foray into fascinating downtown Warsaw, Poland - just outside our door. A truly brilliant experience awaits you at the Warsaw Marriott Hotel.

Description.Name: HWS Header Tag
Description.Text: Visit our Warsaw hotel in the heart of Poland's capital

Description.Name: Sales Message
Description.Text: Warsaw Marriott Hotel is located in the very heart of Warsaw, next to the Central Train Station and one of the best shopping centers Zlote Tarasy, the Palace of Culture and 15 minutes from the airport. Distance to the old town is 15 minutes walk.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 1
Description.Text: Our Warsaw conference center features 27,986 square feet of high-tech spaces and intuitive service.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 2
Description.Text: Host elegant events for up to 700 attendees inside our newly renovated Grand Ballroom.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 3
Description.Text: Three-way dividers in our Baltic Ballroom offer meeting space flexibility in Warsaw for up to 400.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 4
Description.Text: Host dynamic Warsaw events with our conference venue's professional catering and intuitive service.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 5
Description.Text: Stay productive with our business center, Concierge Level, translation facilities and Wi-Fi access.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 6
Description.Text: A dedicated staff of professionals ensure every detail is perfectly executed for flawless events.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 1
Description.Text: Our hotel's location in the Warsaw city center is ideal for exploring the history of Poland.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 2
Description.Text: Explore Royal Castle, Warsaw's first cultural center, from our Warsaw hotel's Old Town location.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 3
Description.Text: Experience the heartbeat of Warsaw from the many nearby museums, galleries and cultural centers,

Description.Text: Bathrobe, Shampoo, Lotion, Mineral Water, Slippers

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: A popular Warsaw bar, Champions is the city's only American sports bar. A great place to watch your favorite game while enjoying regional and international beers and classic American menus, the bar features 37 TVs and two projection screens.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Serving a wide range of hot and cold breakfast options, our Warsaw restaurant's distinctive twist on traditional dining is one that is sure to please.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: A popular hotspot amid Warsaw's nightlife, the chic surrroundings and spectacular views of our 40th floor bar and lounge are outdone only by the great drinks, exceptional food and relaxing atmosphere. Live music every Monday through Saturday.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Discover a captivating taste of Italy here in the heart of Warsaw, Poland. Parmizzano's Restaurant offers fine dining in a sophisticated formal atmosphere. Traditional Italian fare is complemented by an extensive wine list.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Gather and dine with friends or colleagues at this casual and welcoming bar and restaurant, located in the hotel lobby. Stop by between 1:00 and 6:00 pm every Friday for our weekly live cooking demonstration.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Dom Polski Restaurant in the Saska Kepa district of Warsaw ideally reflects the Polish national climate and character. It is located in a beautiful, large house, with a garden open to the public in summer season. The cuisine is typically Polish.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: The Adler restaurant id located very close to Three Cross Square in a characteristic round building on Mokotowska Street. The restaurant serves Bavarian, Polish and European dishes.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Picture youself climbing inside a strawberry wedding cake and you might get a sense of dining in ale Gloria; and if you think the strawberry theme is surreal then just chcek out the white gesse.You can find there a modern Polish menu.

Address.AddressLine: Plac Trzech Krzyzy / Three Cross Square 3

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: The setting inside an orangery in Lazienki Park is excellent, and it's not rare to find peacocks strutting outside with plumage on show. But the food is by no means second fiddle, and the menu here is upmarket as Polish cuisine gets.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: This restaurant resembles an open-air museum. It brings to mind the rooms in houses of wealthy peasants in the 19th century. According to the Old-Polish custom, guests are welcomed here with a treat- a slice bread with lard, apple and herbs.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Yes, this bastion of american burgers and cheesy memorabilia has washed up on the shore of the Vistula as well, right next to Warsaw's shiny new Zlote Tarasy shopping centre.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Herezja is a 3 floor restaurant, gallery and club in the centre of Warsaw. In its 360 sq m large interior you will find many small cosy rooms and nooks, large dance floor and three well-stocked bars.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Delicious meals prepared according to old Polish eastern borderland recipes, various dumplings prepared with sour cream or smoked bacon bits.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: On the banks of the Vistula river, in unforgettable surroundings lies one of the most beautiful located Warsaw restaurant and wine lounge - Boathouse.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: In the modern interior of R20 you can find traditional tastes of Warsaw, Paris or London. You can read the morning paper with delicious co ffee, meet for a business lunch or simply a romantic dinner for two.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Cooking becomes theatre inside U Kucharzy, restaurant where chefs toil next to diners inside what once served as the kitchen of the Europejski hotel. Black and white tiles, hams hanging from ceilings and florid-faced chefs cursing over the din.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: A true Czech style restaurant in the center of Warsaw, right next to the Constitution Square (Plac Konstytucji). With typical Czech cuisine, beer and... Becherovka - the favorite drink of the Good Old Soldier Svejk.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: In the heart of Warsaw, surrounded by a beautiful garden, lies the Villa Foksal Restaurant. We recommend a diversified menu with Polish and Italian cuisine accents, complemented by a rich selection of wines from many regions around the world.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Body sushi, as you might hazard a guess, involves eating sushi off a naked body. Better still, a naked female body. For that end head up the stairs and keep an eye for their weekly 'body shows' held each Friday at ten.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: This two-level, unique restaurant, situated in the city centre, has an ultra-modern interior, which reflects the latest trends. The restaurant sets new standards and offers the highest quality of services.

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: Take Zwirki i Wigury 'Only Exit' for 5.5 kilometers, cross Wawelska and take Raszynska Str for 1 km until Al. Jerozolimskie -turn right. Continue 0.9 km to intersection of Chalubinskiego/Jerozolimskie. Hotel is on right corner, opposite Railway Station.

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: Take road 62 from the Airport towards S7 road to Warsaw. From S7 drive all the way to Warsaw and then follow CENTRUM signs. The Warsaw Marriott Hotel is located right in the centre.

Description.Name: Spa marketing description
Description.Text: SPA FOR YOU is a haven in the center of busy Warsaw that allows you to unwind and relax. Spa is located in Marriott hotel, level -1 (by elevator, directly from room).From room dial: 5116 or 5608.

Description.Name: Directions from Hotel to Spa
Description.Text: Located in the Holmes Place Fittness at -1 level

Description.Name: Spa marketing description
Description.Text: Our philosophy at Oasis Beauty Day Spa is to provide our clients with a calm, relaxing environment where they can forget the stresses of their busy lives, whether for a moment or for the whole day. From room dial: 6470.

Description.Name: Directions from Hotel to Spa
Description.Text: SPA is located in LIM Gallery (Marriott Hotel) on level -1, shop 20.

Message Text
Description.Text: Book your group in the following periods and receive our sizzling specials.Periods: July, August, October, and December 2013. January, February, and March 2014.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Visit our new Executive Lounge located on the second floor. New place has new look, more space, extremely comfortable seats and offers delicious buffet. New Executive Lounge offers computer stations and WiFi.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Visit our new Executive Lounge located on the second floor. New place has new look, more space, extremely comfortable seats and offers delicious buffet. New Executive Lounge offers computer stations and WiFi.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: WorldCup Brasil 2014 only in Champions Bar

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Visit our Champion`s Bar the best place to watch football in Warsaw. Two big screens and 32 TVs ensure that you can enjoy your favorite match from any corner of the bar. Please ask your waiter for our special food and beverage promotions. Reserve your table today and join us! Tel. +48 22 6305419.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Explore our new rooms and enjoy the view

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Our new superior rooms offer a stunning view on Warsaw and an elegant, contemporary decor that has been designed by a world famous interior designer.The room rate includes free Internet access and full American breakfast buffet. Reserve your room today.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: In June and July at Parmizzano`s Restaurat, we will feature a chanterelle-themed menu. Rediscover the outstanding taste of these delectable mushrooms as we prepare them for you in our salads, pastas and meats.

TPA_Ext_eConfo.Title: Enjoy the Brazilian Atmosphere at Champions Sport Bar

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Visit the best sport bar in Warsaw and get the most out of our hot deals!

TPA_Ext_eConfo.Title: Explore our rooms and enjoy the view

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Enjoy our superior rooms which offer a stunning view of Warsaw!

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Chanterelle Mix, rediscover the outstanding taste of these delectable mushrooms.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: Great value for groups looking to experience Warsaw. Temperate weather. Limited market pressure allows for competitive group pricing. Will take up to 200-250 group rooms on peak. Sunday, Monday and Thursday arrivals are best.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: Rate and concession flexibility greatest during this time frame. Limited compression from business travel allows for great group opportunity and availability. Government per diem available over most dates. Will take up to 350 rooms on peak.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: Limited demand over holiday time frames from group and BT. Great flexibility with rates, concessions, space, and contract terms. Group need time. Will take up to 350 group rooms on peak.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: Ideal for corp. groups incl. pharma, financial, insurance and high-tech. Still good weather for taking advantage to experience the city and old town. Strong BT and group interest. 150-250 rooms on peak. Sun, Mon, Thu arrivals are best.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: Limited demand over holiday time frames from group and BT. Great flexibility with rates, concessions, space, and contract terms. Group need time. Will take up to 350 group rooms on peak.

Description.Name: Renovation description
Description.Text: Warsaw Marriott Hotel implemented Great Room. Our full service hotel lobby was redesigned into a new area of modern technology, great food and service, and unique spaces to accommodate the way our guests socialize ,work, and relax.

Description.Name: Renovation description
Description.Text: The summer 2010 renovation of the entire (2.600sqm, 27.000sqf) meeting space made the Warsaw Marriott Hotel an even more exciting place for guests to relax, work, dine and hold meetings.

Description.Name: Sales strategy
Description.Text: Warsaw has emerged as one of Europe's most vibrant cosmopolitan centers, enduring for over 800 years on the banks of the River Vistula. In the center of this thriving city is the elegant Warsaw Marriott Hotel, located across from the landmark Palace of Culture and the main train station. The international airport is only a 15 minutes drive away. Shopping mall, old town, casino and tempting dining options are in walking distance, to include the enchanting Parmizzano's Restaurant, famous for its Italian cuisine and the highest hotel bar in Europe, Panorama Bar & Lounge on the 40th floor with magnificent views. For business and social events, the Warsaw Marriott Hotel offers 523 spacious rooms including 95 suits, 20 meeting rooms with over 2,600 sq m (27.000 sq f) of flexible meeting space and exhibition venue all equipped with WiFi. The Health academy provides state-of-the-art equipment for a thorough workout, plus soothing spa treatments and an indoor pool.

Description.Name: Value proposition 1
Description.Text: Warsaw Marriott Hotel is located downtown Warsaw, next to the Central train station and one of the best shopping centers "Zlote Tarasy" across the Palace of Culture and 15 minutes from the international airport. Distance to the old town is 15 minutes walk

Description.Name: Value proposition 2
Description.Text: For business and social events, the Warsaw Marriott Hotel offers 523 spacious rooms including 95 suits, 20 new renovated meeting rooms with over 2,600 sq m (27.000 sq f) of flexible meeting space and exhibition venue, all equipped with WiFi.

Description.Name: Value proposition 3
Description.Text: As of August 2011 Warsaw Marriott Hotel implemented Great Room. Our full service hotel lobby was redesigned into a new area of modern technology, great food and service, and unique spaces to accommodate the way our guests socialize, work, and relax.

Description.Name: Value proposition 4
Description.Text: End your day your way within our temperature controlled indoor pool, state of the art fitness center with cardio equipment and free weights, or check out the nightlife in nearby Old Town
